name: Beach Paradise Package
description: A 7-day coastal getaway exploring Sri Lanka's southern beaches, wildlife, and cultural gems.

places.name: Mirissa Beach
places.description: Famous for whale watching and golden sunsets.

places.name: Unawatuna Beach
places.description: Crescent-shaped bay with coral reefs and beachside cafes.

places.name: Jungle Beach
places.description: Secluded cove accessible via a forest trail.

places.name: Dalawella Beach
places.description: Known for its iconic palm-fringed rope swing.

places.name: Hiriketiya Beach
places.description: Horseshoe-shaped bay perfect for surfing beginners.

places.name: Polhena Beach
places.description: Protected reef beach ideal for safe swimming.

places.name: Tangalle Beach
places.description: Long stretch of untouched sand with dramatic rock formations.

places.name: Rekawa Beach
places.description: Sea turtle nesting site (Novemberâ€“April).

places.name: Galle Fort
places.description: UNESCO World Heritage Site with Dutch-colonial architecture.

places.name: Hummanaya Blowhole
places.description: The only known blowhole in Sri Lanka, shooting water 25m high.

places.name: Weligama Bay
places.description: Gentle waves for beginner surfers and iconic stilt fishermen.

places.name: Bundala National Park
places.description: Ramsar wetland with flamingos, crocodiles, and migratory birds.

places.name: Mawella Beach
places.description: Pristine and uncrowded beach with calm waters.

places.name: Koggala Beach
places.description: Long sandy beach near a historic lake and cinnamon plantations.

places.name: Dickwella Beach
places.description: Quiet beach with a nearby lighthouse and blowhole.

places.name: Great Basses Reef
places.description: Historic shipwrecks and vibrant coral for advanced divers.

places.name: Mulkirigala Rock Temple
places.description: Ancient Buddhist caves with panoramic coastal views.

places.name: Kalametiya Bird Sanctuary
places.description: Mangrove forest teeming with migratory birds.

places.name: Secret Beach (Mirissa)
places.description: Hidden cove accessible via a rocky path, popular for privacy.

places.name: Talpe Beach
places.description: Serene beach with golden sand, ideal for long walks.

name: Anuradhapura Ancient City Tour
description: Explore the ancient capital of Sri Lanka with its magnificent dagobas, palaces and sacred sites

places.name: Sri Maha Bodhi
places.description: The sacred fig tree grown from a cutting of the original Bodhi tree under which Buddha attained enlightenment

places.name: Ruwanwelisaya
places.description: One of the tallest ancient stupas in the world built by King Dutugemunu

places.name: Jetavanaramaya
places.description: Massive brick stupa that was once the third tallest structure in the ancient world

places.name: Abhayagiri Dagoba
places.description: One of the most extensive ruins in the world and a center of Theravada Buddhism

places.name: Thuparamaya
places.description: The first stupa built in Sri Lanka after the introduction of Buddhism

places.name: Lovamahapaya
places.description: Also known as the Brazen Palace, was a massive structure with 1600 stone pillars

places.name: Isurumuniya Temple
places.description: Famous for its rock carvings including the Isurumuniya Lovers

places.name: Mirisaweti Stupa
places.description: Built by King Dutugemunu after placing the Buddha's relics in his scepter

places.name: Kuttam Pokuna
places.description: Twin ponds considered an engineering marvel of ancient Sri Lanka

places.name: Samadhi Buddha Statue
places.description: One of the finest examples of ancient Sri Lankan sculpture

places.name: Ratnaprasada
places.description: The Gem Palace with its beautifully carved guardstones and moonstones

places.name: Vessagiriya
places.description: Ancient monastic complex with rock caves and inscriptions

places.name: Maha Vihara Museum
places.description: Museum displaying artifacts from Anuradhapura's golden age

places.name: Ranmasu Uyana
places.description: Ancient royal pleasure gardens with star-shaped ponds

places.name: Tissa Wewa
places.description: Ancient reservoir built by King Devanampiya Tissa

places.name: Basawakkulama Wewa
places.description: The oldest reservoir in Anuradhapura built by King Pandukabhaya

places.name: Eth Pokuna
places.description: The massive Elephant Pond used by monks in ancient times

places.name: Lankarama
places.description: Ancient stupa built by King Valagamba

places.name: Sela Cetiya
places.description: Small but beautifully preserved stupa near the Abhayagiri complex

places.name: Anuradhapura Archaeological Museum
places.description: Museum showcasing artifacts from Anuradhapura's ancient civilization

description: Explore the cultural heart of Sri Lanka

places.name: Temple of the Tooth
places.description: Most sacred Buddhist temple in Sri Lanka

places.name: Royal Botanical Gardens
places.description: Beautiful gardens with diverse plant species

places.name: Udawattakele Forest Reserve
places.description: A beautiful rainforest reserve in Kandy

places.name: Bahirawakanda Vihara Buddha Statue
places.description: A giant Buddha statue overlooking Kandy

places.name: Ceylon Tea Museum
places.description: A museum showcasing Sri Lanka's tea history

places.name: Kandy Lake
places.description: A scenic artificial lake in the heart of Kandy

places.name: Hanthana Mountain Range
places.description: A perfect spot for hiking and nature lovers

places.name: Commonwealth War Cemetery
places.description: A historical cemetery from World War II

places.name: Kandy View Point
places.description: Panoramic view of Kandy city and surrounding hills

places.name: Kandy Arts & Crafts Center
places.description: Showcasing traditional Sri Lankan arts and crafts

places.name: Kandy Garrison Cemetery
places.description: Historic British colonial-era cemetery

places.name: Kandy City Center
places.description: Modern shopping complex in the heart of Kandy

places.name: Kandy National Museum
places.description: Museum showcasing Kandyan era artifacts and history

places.name: Kandy Cultural Show
places.description: Traditional Kandyan dance and music performance

places.name: Gadaladeniya Temple
places.description: Ancient Buddhist temple with unique architecture

places.name: Lankatilaka Temple
places.description: Magnificent ancient temple with impressive architecture

places.name: Embekka Devalaya
places.description: Famous for its intricate wood carvings from the Kandyan era

places.name: Kandy Spice Garden
places.description: Learn about Sri Lanka's famous spices and herbs

places.name: Kandy Market
places.description: Vibrant local market with fresh produce and souvenirs

places.name: Kandy Railway Station
places.description: Historic colonial-era railway station with scenic train rides

places.name: Kandy War Cemetery
places.description: Well-maintained Commonwealth war graves cemetery

name: Nuwara Eliya Package
description: Explore the 'Little England' of Sri Lanka with its tea plantations, waterfalls, and colonial charm

places.name: Gregory Lake
places.description: Scenic artificial lake offering boat rides and beautiful views

places.name: Hakgala Botanical Garden
places.description: Beautiful gardens with diverse plant species and stunning views

places.name: Seetha Amman Temple
places.description: Colorful Hindu temple associated with the Ramayana epic

places.name: Lovers Leap Waterfall
places.description: Beautiful waterfall with a romantic legend behind its name

places.name: Victoria Park
places.description: Beautifully maintained park with colorful flowers and birdwatching opportunities

places.name: Tea Factory & Tea Museum
places.description: Learn about Sri Lanka's famous tea production process

places.name: Single Tree Hill
places.description: Panoramic viewpoint offering stunning views of Nuwara Eliya

places.name: Moon Plains
places.description: High-altitude plains with stunning views and wildlife

places.name: St. Clair's Falls

places.name: Ramboda Falls
places.description: Impressive waterfall located near Nuwara Eliya

places.name: Nuwara Eliya Golf Club
places.description: Historic 18-hole golf course with stunning mountain views

places.name: Galway's Land National Park
places.description: Small national park known for its birdlife and nature trails

places.description: Iconic colonial-era post office with British architecture

places.description: Horse racing track with colonial heritage

places.description: Vibrant local market selling fresh produce and flowers

places.name: Lake Gregory Boating

places.name: Nuwara Eliya Strawberry Farms
places.description: Visit strawberry farms and enjoy fresh strawberries

places.name: Nuwara Eliya Golf Course View Point
